title: Formal and contextual analysis of Pyramids at Giza

content.question: The images show a plan and a view of the pyramid complex at Giza. Using specific evidence, analyze how the pyramid complex was shaped by both the beliefs and the practices of the culture that built it.

frqParts.text: The images show a plan and a view of the pyramid complex at Giza. Using specific evidence, analyze how the pyramid complex was shaped by both the beliefs and the practices of the culture that built it.

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
